name: Zombie Hallucination
description:
***The web version is laggy. I recommend downloading the game.***

An FPS made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

You are hallucinating zombies. When you touch them you start to lose sanity. Eventually you will start hallucinating the zombies to be spawning faster. Then you will start to imagine each zombie being two zombies. Then you will start to imagine each zombie being four zombies. Eventually if you lose all of your sanity you will die!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot

Credits:

Sound/Music

Models

Buttons

Sanity Bar

Font
